section.p: You attempt to find refuge from the furious storm but the best you can do is cower in the lee of a steep slope. You strip off your equipment and try to keep your clothes dry.
To your horror, you turn to see your equipment sliding down the muddy incline and into a torrent of blood-red mud. You scramble down to salvage what you can.
For each item on your equipment list, roll one die. If a five or a six comes up, the item is washed away and lost. Cross it off your Adventure Sheet.
You also lose a point of Stamina from the cold.
The next day, you carry on. .
